text:
HYPE.de | Cologne/Köln, Germany | ONSITE | Java developers | full time or part time

HYPE is hiring Java developers in Cologne/Köln, Junior or Senior level. Tech stack: Java 11, Kafka, Spring, JPA/Hibernate, JAX-RS, jQuery, React

HYPE started out as a spin-off from DaimlerChrysler. Soon, we focused on innovation software and learned how to build it with the client’s success in mind. Today, we are among the leaders of the field. And this is only where our journey begins.

More info: https://www.hypeinnovation.com/de/ueber-hype/full-stack-java... https://www.hypeinnovation.com/de/ueber-hype/karriere/back-e... https://www.hypeinnovation.com/de/ueber-hype/werkstudent-sof...
